items.title: Green Gem
items.description: This green gem will unlock the powers of your dreams. With certified Magical-Plastic construction, this gem has unrivaled power. Manufactured by Target.

items.title: Myth Stone Staff
items.description: Sleep Soundly, this staff will keep you protected at all times. It has thousands of possible spells to choose from. Manufactured by TEMU.

reviews.review: I was a normal wizard before I bought this

items.title: Magical Skull
items.description: With this Skull, you can rest soundly, or make your enemies rest forever. Created with a fair-trade human soul. Manufactured by Wraitheon.

items.title: Mystery Scroll
items.description: Contains one mystery spell out of 1000+ choices. Manufactered by TheBeast.

reviews.review: I got a really good spell. WOW!!!!!!
It's blank. Nice quality paper though

items.title: Potion of Sleep
items.description: A potion that can send any creature of any size into an immediate slumber. Manufactered by Pfizer.

reviews.review: Mixed this into my elixir. Good stuff.

items.title: Amulet of Fire
items.description: Contains a fire gem rated to heat up to 500°C or 932°F. Manufactured by Wizard's Club.

reviews.review: This amulet burned down my house. Just in time!!

items.title: Skeleton Minion
items.description: Skeleton Minions are designed to serve even the toughest of jobs. Created with real Warlock Magic, they will last 2 years before the necromancy must be renewed. Manufactured by WarLocks LLC.

reviews.review: These people still won't give me my body back.

items.title: Illusory Dragon
items.description: This Dragon is not real. Manufactured by TEMU

items.title: Real Creature
items.description: We will summon a real creature at any position you desire, We have no responsibility over what this creature does. Distributed by Warlock's Heed.

reviews.review: Great prank for some saturday afternoon fun!
I see no use for this filth. A bomb has no place in wizardry.
I see one use for this

items.title: The Jade Stones
items.description: These stones hold the key to untamed magical power. Do not use in the prescence of anyone you wish to live another day. Manufactured by Huawei.

reviews.review: Thank you for these. I have been given great joy.

items.title: The Bulwark's Bicycle
items.description: This item creates propulsion only through the power of the body of the rider.
